author: LUIS TATO
title: Climate scientists say that global warming is making extreme weather events more frequent and intense
text:
Climate scientists say that global warming is making extreme weather events more frequent and intense
- LUIS TATO
- Updated
[0](/news/national_news/climate-scientists-say-that-global-warming-is-making-extreme-weather-events-more-frequent-and-intense/image_889ba72e-b62f-5db7-b177-82390c412968.html#comments)
Tags
As featured on
The last two years exceeded on average a critical warming limit for the first time as global temperatures soar "beyond what modern humans have ever experienced", an EU agency said Friday.
